tooltip.bloodmagic.extraInfo: &9-按住 Shift 了解更多資訊-
tooltip.bloodmagic.sigil.teleposition.de: I am very close to being moved by this.
tooltip.bloodmagic.sigil.transposition.d: Feel the power of the Force, my young apprentice.
tooltip.bloodmagic.livingArmourPointsUpg: Increases the max points of Living Armour to %d.
tooltip.bloodmagic.sacrificialDagger.des: Just a prick of the finger will suffice...
tooltip.bloodmagic.sacrificialDagger.cre: Right click an altar while sneaking to fill it
tooltip.bloodmagic.ritualReader.desc.set: 右擊已啟用儀式的主儀式石，選至你想更改的區域，隨後分別右擊新區域角落的兩個方塊。
tooltip.bloodmagic.ritualReader.desc.inf: 右擊已啟用儀式的主儀式石了解儀式的基本資訊。
tooltip.bloodmagic.ritualReader.desc.set: 設置儀式將消耗的惡魔意志類型， 工具欄中存放該類晶體右擊主儀式石.
tooltip.bloodmagic.arcaneAshes: 用於繪製煉金矩陣的粉灰
tooltip.bloodmagic.telepositionFocus.wea: Used to move blocks in the world
tooltip.bloodmagic.telepositionFocus.enh: Used to move blocks in the world
tooltip.bloodmagic.telepositionFocus.rei: Used to move blocks in the world
tooltip.bloodmagic.telepositionFocus.dem: Used to move blocks in the world
tooltip.bloodmagic.sentientSword.desc: 以惡魔意志喚起其最大潛能。
tooltip.bloodmagic.sentientAxe.desc: 以惡魔意志喚起其最大潛能。
tooltip.bloodmagic.sentientPickaxe.desc: 以惡魔意志喚起其最大潛能。
tooltip.bloodmagic.sentientShovel.desc: 以惡魔意志喚起其最大潛能。
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulGem.petty: 用於儲存微量意志的寶石
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulGem.lesser: 用於儲存少量意志的寶石
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulGem.common: 用於儲存更多意志的寶石
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulGem.greater: 用於儲存大量意志的寶石
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulGem.grand: 用於儲存極大數額意志的寶石
tooltip.bloodmagic.soulSnare.desc: 投擲向怪物並消滅它們來獲取附於其身的惡魔意志
tooltip.bloodmagic.itemFilter.exact: Will make sure the items match precisely
tooltip.bloodmagic.itemFilter.ignoreNBT: Ignores the NBT of the filter
tooltip.bloodmagic.itemFilter.modItems: Matches all items from the same mod
tooltip.bloodmagic.itemFilter.oreDict: Used to filter through the Ore Dictionary
tooltip.bloodmagic.willGauge: A strange device that can measure the Demon Will in the Aura.
ritual.bloodmagic.blockRange.tooBig: 提供的方塊範圍過大！最多不超過 %s 個方塊。
ritual.bloodmagic.blockRange.tooFar: 提供的方塊範圍太遠！需要在垂直距離 %s ， 水平距離 %s 之內。
ritual.bloodmagic.blockRange.inactive: 該儀式石目前無活動，沒有可修改的範圍。
ritual.bloodmagic.blockRange.firstBlock: 記錄新範圍的第一個方塊。
ritual.bloodmagic.willConfig.set: 該儀式將使用這類惡魔意志類型：%s
ritual.bloodmagic.willConfig.void: 該儀式不再會使用惡魔意志
ritual.bloodmagic.waterRitual.info: 通過主儀式石生成一個水源方塊。
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.info: 通過主儀式石生成一個熔岩源方塊
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.default.inf: [原生]降低生成熔岩的LP消耗，並將熔岩導入連接的容器內
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.corrosive.i: [腐蝕]範圍內免疫火焰傷害的實體將受到傷害
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.destructive: [破壞]岩漿的放置範圍根據意志的總量增加
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.vengeful.in: [覆仇]給予範圍內實體緩燃引線效果（上天）
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.steadfast.i: [堅毅]給予範圍內的玩家防火效果
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.info: 在其範圍內種植農作物
攻擊其傷害範圍內的生物，並將所獲LP儲入鄰近的血之祭壇
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.i: 扣除其範圍內的玩家生命值，並將所獲LP儲入鄰近的血之祭壇
ritual.bloodmagic.regenerationRitual.inf: 治療其範圍內失去生命值的實體
ritual.bloodmagic.regenerationRitual.cor: [腐蝕]從非玩家的實體身上汲取鮮血以治療玩家
ritual.bloodmagic.harvestRitual.info: 收割其範圍內的植物，產物掉落於地上
ritual.bloodmagic.magneticRitual.info: 將地底的礦石傳送至其放置區域
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.info: 破壞其挖掘範圍內的方塊，並將掉落物放置於所連接的箱子
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.destruc: [破壞]強力的破壞方塊：所有方塊破壞受 時運III 影響
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.steadfa: [堅毅]以 精準采集 獲取被破壞方塊。適用情況下覆蓋時運
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.corrosi: [腐蝕]所有被破壞方塊將以基礎切削油的形式處理。適用情況下覆蓋精準采集
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.vengefu: [覆仇]壓縮庫存內的物品（如將煤炭壓縮成煤炭塊），目前每次操作僅執行一次壓縮。
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.default: [原生]根據意志總量增加儀式的運行速度
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.corro: [腐蝕]範圍內的實體將被附近的植物攻擊， 蠶食掉他們的生命
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.defau: [原生]根據靈域內意志的總量加快所有的儀式運作速度
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.venge: [覆仇]增加生長刻成功的速率
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.stead: [堅毅]在水合範圍內， 種子會被再次種植且方塊會被潤濕
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.destr: [破壞] 促進作物生長的範圍根據意志的總量增加
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.d: [原生] 根據靈域內意志的總量增加儀式的運行速度
[破壞] 根據意志總量增加儀式的產出的LP
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.v: [覆仇] 將犧牲的最小生命值設為10%%.覆蓋[堅毅]的效果
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.c: [腐蝕] 使用玩家的“熏香”來提高收益
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.s: [堅毅]  將犧牲的最小生命值設為30%%到70%%
ritual.bloodmagic.speedRitual.default.in: [原生] 根據意志總量增加儀式產生的移動速度
ritual.bloodmagic.speedRitual.vengeful.i: [覆仇] 防止玩家與成年動物被運輸，如果與[破壞]配合，則運輸玩家
ritual.bloodmagic.speedRitual.destructiv: [破壞] 防止玩家與幼年動物被運輸，如果與[覆仇]配合，則運輸玩家
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.ven: [覆仇] 減少成年動物繁殖的間隔時間
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.ste: [堅毅] 使用箱子內的物品飼養區域內的動物
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.def: [原生] 根據靈域內意志的總量增加儀式的運行速度
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.des: [破壞]讓最近沒有繁殖後代的成年動物沖向怪物自爆
ritual.bloodmagic.groundingRitual.info: 將實體壓在地面上，防止其跳躍。
ritual.bloodmagic.groundingRitual.corros: [腐蝕] 移除重力 [+覆仇] 啟用升天。
ritual.bloodmagic.groundingRitual.destru: [破壞] 啟用對心臟的作用 (增加摔落傷害) [+覆仇] 增強效果。
ritual.bloodmagic.groundingRitual.steadf: [堅毅] 影響Boss。不影響免疫負面藥水效果或是影響移動的負面效果的Boss （尤其是雕靈和終界龍）。
ritual.bloodmagic.groundingRitual.vengef: [覆仇] 增強效果。 [+腐蝕] 啟用升天模式。 [+破壞] 對心臟的作用更進一步。
ritual.bloodmagic.condorRitual.info: 儀式附近一定範圍內提供飛行能力。
ritual.bloodmagic.eternalSoulRitual.info: 有虧損地將生命源質從一個靈魂網路轉移至一個祭壇。
ritual.bloodmagic.crystalSplitRitual.inf: 將生長良好的原始晶體群分裂成獨立的預期晶體群。
ritual.bloodmagic.fullStomachRitual.info: 從連接的箱子中獲取食物，來補充玩家的饑餓值。
ritual.bloodmagic.interdictionRitual.inf: 使其範圍內的所有生物推離於主儀式石。
ritual.bloodmagic.containmentRitual.info: 使其範圍內的所有生物牽引向主儀式石。
ritual.bloodmagic.speedRitual.info: 將其範圍內的玩家以儀式方向拋射出去。
ritual.bloodmagic.suppressionRitual.info: 抑制其範圍內的液體；停用儀式時恢覆。
ritual.bloodmagic.expulsionRitual.info: 驅逐其範圍內，非啟用者或主儀式石上方箱子中無綁定血寶珠的玩家，離開該區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.zephyrRitual.info: 拾取其範圍內的掉落物，並放入所連接的箱子。
ritual.bloodmagic.upgradeRemoveRitual.in: 移除束靈護甲上所有的升級（和降級），並給予你相應的升級（降級）手冊。這些手冊還能夠再次應用到你的束靈護甲上。
ritual.bloodmagic.armourEvolveRitual.inf: 將你的束靈護甲的升級點數提升到300點。
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.inf: 加快其範圍內的幼年動物的生長速度。
ritual.bloodmagic.forsakenSoulRitual.inf: 對其傷害範圍內的生物造成傷害，當生物死亡時，其晶體範圍內的惡魔晶簇將生長。
ritual.bloodmagic.crystalHarvestRitual.i: 破壞範圍內的惡魔意志晶簇，掉落物丟於晶簇頂部。
ritual.bloodmagic.placerRitual.info: 取出所連接的容器中的方塊，並放置於世界中。
ritual.bloodmagic.fellingRitual.info: 一個伐木設施，該儀式將砍伐其範圍內所有樹與葉子，並收集掉落物。
ritual.bloodmagic.pumpRitual.info: 從規定範圍獲取液體。只有當所連接的液體容器至少有一桶量的相同液體時，移入液體。
ritual.bloodmagic.altarBuilderRitual.inf: 將所連接的容器中的祭壇部件搭建出來。
ritual.bloodmagic.portalRitual.info: 創建一個傳送門網路，以啟用者及直接接觸方塊為基礎，兩者相同的兩個傳送門達成連接。啟用後未修改傳送網路的情況下方塊可以變更。
ritual.bloodmagic.meteorRitual.info: 消耗其物品範圍內的一個物品，從天空中召喚一個充滿資源的流星，直接墜向儀式。
ritual.bloodmagic.waterRitual.waterRange: (水源) 儀式放置水源方塊的區域。
[原生] 儀式將水導入其中的儲罐。
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.lavaRange.i: (岩漿) 儀式放置岩漿方塊的區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.lavaTank.in: [原生] 儀式將岩漿導入其中的儲罐
ritual.bloodmagic.lavaRitual.fireFuse.in: [覆仇] 在這個區域內的實體將遭受緩燃引線效果
[堅毅] 玩家在此區域內可獲得防火buff
[腐蝕] 該區域內免疫火焰傷害的實體將受到傷害，傷害量與意志的量相關
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.growi: (生長) 儀式加快植物生長的區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.leech: [腐蝕] 區域內實體的生命將流失於滋養附近的農作物。
ritual.bloodmagic.greenGroveRitual.hydra: [堅毅] 區域內的方塊將被潤濕為耕地，且區域內的種子將被就近種植。
ritual.bloodmagic.jumpRitual.jumpRange.i: (跳躍) 在這個區域內的實體將躍向高空。
(祭壇) 規定儀式檢測血之祭壇的區域。該項修改為添加或撤銷一個坐標。
(傷害) 規定儀式傷害生物的區域。該區域內所有生物(除了玩家)將持續受到傷害。
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.a: (祭壇) 規定儀式檢測血之祭壇的區域。該項修改為添加或撤銷一個坐標。
ritual.bloodmagic.featheredKnifeRitual.d: (傷害) 規定儀式傷害玩家的區域。該區域內的玩家將持續受到傷害直至設定的生命值下限。
ritual.bloodmagic.regenerationRitual.hea: (治癒) 該區域內的實體將獲得生命恢覆buff。
ritual.bloodmagic.regenerationRitual.vam: (血蛭) 汲取區域內怪物的生命來治癒玩家
ritual.bloodmagic.harvestRitual.harvestR: (收割) 該區域內的植物將被收割。
ritual.bloodmagic.magneticRitual.placeme: (放置) 儀式將把獲取的礦石放置於該區域內。
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.crushin: (挖掘) 該區域的方塊將被破壞。
ritual.bloodmagic.crushingRitual.chest.i: (箱子) 箱子位置，儀式將把破壞的方塊放入其中。
ritual.bloodmagic.fullStomachRitual.fill: (餵食) 儀式將會餵食該區域內的玩家。
ritual.bloodmagic.fullStomachRitual.ches: (箱子) 箱子位置， 儀式將提取其中的食物來餵食區域內的玩家。
ritual.bloodmagic.interdictionRitual.int: (推離) 儀式推離生物的區域。無論該區域位於何處，所有生物將被推離於主儀式石。
ritual.bloodmagic.containmentRitual.cont: (牽引) 儀式牽引生物的區域。無論該區域位於何處，所有生物將被牽引向主儀式石。
ritual.bloodmagic.speedRitual.sanicRange: (速度) 所有位於該區域內的實體，將被拋射向儀式擺相成的箭頭方向。
ritual.bloodmagic.suppressionRitual.supp: (抑液) 該區域內所有液體將被儀式抑制。
ritual.bloodmagic.expulsionRitual.expuls: (驅逐) 該區域非儀式所有者的玩家，或者箱子中有寶珠的玩家，會被傳送開此地。
ritual.bloodmagic.zephyrRitual.zephyrRan: (拾取) 該區域內的物品將被拾取儲入所連接箱子。
ritual.bloodmagic.zephyrRitual.chest.inf: (箱子) 箱子位置， 儀式將把拾取的物品放入其中。
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.gro: (成長) 該區域內的動物將成長得更快。
ritual.bloodmagic.animalGrowthRitual.che: (箱子) 用於存放餵養動物物品的箱子
ritual.bloodmagic.forsakenSoulRitual.cry: (晶體) 當有生物因儀式死亡時，該區域內的晶簇生長速度將加快。
ritual.bloodmagic.forsakenSoulRitual.dam: (傷害) 該區域內的生物將緩慢的收到傷害，當死亡時晶簇將生長。
ritual.bloodmagic.crystalHarvestRitual.c: (晶體) 晶簇將被破壞成僅留單晶的晶簇，被破壞的晶體將掉落於世界。
ritual.bloodmagic.ellipseRitual.info: 在儀式周圍使用附加的箱子創建一個中空球體。
ritual.bloodmagic.ellipseRitual.spheroid: （放置）儀式將放置的範圍。球體以儀式為中心 - 如果一側比球體對面的一側短，則截斷。
ritual.bloodmagic.ellipseRitual.chest.in: (箱子) 箱子位置， 儀式將提取其中的方塊放置於世界中。
ritual.bloodmagic.placerRitual.placerRan: (放置) 儀式將放置方塊的區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.placerRitual.chest.inf: (箱子) 箱子位置， 儀式將提取其中的方塊放置於世界中。
ritual.bloodmagic.fellingRitual.fellingR: (砍伐) 儀式將搜尋原木和樹葉並進行砍伐的區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.fellingRitual.chest.in: (箱子) 箱子位置， 儀式將把掉落物放入其中。
ritual.bloodmagic.pumpRitual.pumpRange.i: (引水) 儀式於世界中獲取液體的區域。
ritual.bloodmagic.downgradeRitual.dialog: So, mortal, you want to gain more power...?
Of course you must know that everything has a cost... I cannot simply grant you more power without you paying something in return...
If you lay an offering before me, you will forsake your perception, preventing you from using long-ranged projectiles with any form of accuracy. Arrows will no longer be your key to victory.
But in return, I will unlock your armour so that it may grow even further... All you have to do is kneel before this altar with the correct offering...
Fufufu... Greetings. I see that you wish to become more powerful.
You must be fully aware that when one's cup becomes full, it invariably has to empty once more to be filled again.
As such, I offer you a deal: by forsaking one's ability to drink, I shall grant you a vast increase to your potential. Whether this is a deal you think is worth taking is another matter entirely...
So kneel, mortal, and drink from this cup that I offer to you, for it may be your last drink.
Hmmm... What is it that you truly desire?
If it is strength beyond mortal men, then I cannot provide that - instead, I can offer you a different deal...
I can expand the capabilities of your armour, allowing you to achieve greater heights. However, I will need something from you in return: your strength in physical combat.
By agreeing to this, you will no longer be able to swing a weapon with as much certainty, only able to do a fraction of the damage you could before.
So, the choice is yours: will you kneel at this altar, or will you still take up your sword?
Beware, mortal, for you are on shaky ground.
Unlike my comrades, I offer one of the most grim deals that you could possibly hope for as a magician that deals in your own health.
Although your wounds may heal, they will do so slowly if you accept my "offering," and the stings of battle will plague you even more.
So think carefully before you rush into something that you may regret, since even though your cup may be empty it will be almost impossible to fill once more...
chat.bloodmagic.altarMaker.creativeOnly: This is a creative only item.
chat.bloodmagic.ritual.weak: 你感到有股拉力， 但沒有足夠的力量來完成這個儀式.
chat.bloodmagic.ritual.activate: 一股能量流經這個儀式!
chat.bloodmagic.ritual.notValid: 這些儀式石似乎有些擺放不得當...
chat.bloodmagic.livingArmour.upgrade.poi: You are starting to feel better already!
chat.bloodmagic.livingArmour.upgrade.fir: &6A cool feeling envelopes you as the burning subsides.
chat.bloodmagic.livingArmour.upgrade.gri: &6A shadowy force pulls you from the brink of death!
chat.bloodmagic.altar.nextTier: The next tier of blood altar is missing %s at %s.
chat.bloodmagic.mimic.potionInterval.up: Potion Interval has been increased to: %d ticks.
chat.bloodmagic.mimic.potionInterval.dow: Potion Interval has been decreased to: %d ticks.
chat.bloodmagic.mimic.detectRadius.up: Player detection radius has been increased to: %d blocks.
chat.bloodmagic.mimic.detectRadius.down: Player detection radius has been decreased to: %d blocks.
Potion spawning radius has been increased to: %d blocks.
Potion spawning radius has been decreased to: %d blocks.
death.attack.ritual_damage: %1$s has been sacrificed for a ritual.
entity.bloodmagic.SentientSpecter.name: Sentient Specter
entity.bloodmagic.Mimic.name: Mimic
commands.bloodmagic.error.arg.player.mis: You must specify which player you wish to perform this action on.
commands.bloodmagic.error.negative: Amount must be a positive Integer.
commands.bloodmagic.error.outofbounds: Given integer is too large (must be within list ID boundaries).
commands.bloodmagic.help.help: Displays the help information for the "/bloodmagic" command.
commands.bloodmagic.network.syphon.help: Removes the given amount of LP from the given player's LP network.
commands.bloodmagic.network.syphon.amoun: Cannot syphon more LP than available.
commands.bloodmagic.network.add.help: Adds the given amount of LP to the given player's LP network. Follows standard LP gain rules.
commands.bloodmagic.network.add.success: Successfully added %d LP to %s's LP network.
commands.bloodmagic.network.set.help: Sets the given player's LP to the given amount.
commands.bloodmagic.network.set.success: Successfully set %s's LP network to %d LP.
commands.bloodmagic.network.get.help: Returns the amount of LP in the given player's LP network.
commands.bloodmagic.network.fill.help: Fills the given player's LP network to %d.
commands.bloodmagic.network.cap.help: Fills the given player's LP network to the max that their highest Blood Orb can store.
commands.bloodmagic.network.tickethistor: Shows the soul ticket history containing information about LP consumers for the player
commands.bloodmagic.bind.help: Attempts to (un)bind the currently held item.
commands.bloodmagic.bind.error.ownerEqua: Nothing changed: Target and current owner are equal.
commands.bloodmagic.orb.help: Used to set or get the Player's max Blood Orb tier.
commands.bloodmagic.orb.get.help: Used to get the Player's max Blood Orb tier.
commands.bloodmagic.orb.set.help: Used to set the Player's max Blood Orb tier.
commands.bloodmagic.orb.error.tierTooHig: Orb tier cannot be higher than %d.
commands.bloodmagic.ritual.create.help: Creates the specified ritual with the MRS at your feet, ignores other blocks by default. (Optional parameters: ([<player> (safe|true|false)] | [safe|true|false]))
commands.bloodmagic.ritual.repair.help: Repairs the ritual with the closest match to the remaining ritual stones, ignores other blocks by default. (Optional parameters: ([<player> (safe|true|false)] | [safe|true|false]))
commands.bloodmagic.ritual.create.noRitu: You must select a ritual. (Tab-completions are available!)
Created or repaired ritual cannot be placed safely.
Created or repaired ritual would be out of world boundaries.
commands.bloodmagic.ritual.error.noMRS: You need to stand on a Master Ritual Stone to execute the command!
commands.bloodmagic.teleposer.list.help: Returns a list of all valid teleposers, optionally possessed by [player].
commands.bloodmagic.teleposer.teleport.h: Teleports to the location of the specified teleposer.
commands.bloodmagic.teleposer.teleportfo: Teleports to the location stored in the specified teleposer's focus.
commands.bloodmagic.teleposer.rmrf.help: Follows teleposer foci and removes all teleposers along the path, starting with the specified teleposer.
Removes all teleposers or all teleposers containing a focus bound to [player], if specified.
tile.bloodmagic.inputNode.name: Input Node
tile.bloodmagic.outputNode.name: Output Node
jei.bloodmagic.desc.altarBuilder:
A creative-only item for use in debugging and testing.

Shift + Right click to change the tier to build. Right click an Altar to initiate the build.

Break an Altar while holding to dismantle it.
jei.bloodmagic.desc.demonicWill: An imprint of a demonic entity attached to a creature.\n\nCan be obtained by killing a mob with a sentient weapon or by throwing a snare at a mob and killing it while it has white particles.
bloodmagic.research_page.BLOODMAGIC.1: The realm of the Blood Magics has always appeared to be a more solitary and "individual" art with blood mages being notoriously reclusive and a bit insane at times. However, the powers of self-sacrifice and life essence have uses even beyond a normal blood mage's sight, in fact, it is quite apparent that it may have some uses in thaumaturgy after all!
